Please keep seeding. I love this movie! The way that Jim Jarmusch, Neil Young, Johnny Depp and Gary Farmer set the athmosphere is just magical.
I use VLC, but as I play this one, Windows closes it. I try leter to make it work... some ideas in the meantime maybe?

Frenchy BĂŠnich

excellent download speed, downloaded this within an hour:-D cheers! i love Jim Jarmusch, as a token of my appreciation i will be seeding this with  unlimited speed for a while... 

can more people seed 'down by law'??? its my personal jim jarmusch favorite:)

This is one of the most brilliant films I've ever seen, and by far Depp's best performance.  It played flawlessly on GOM, which is much underrated.  As far as embedded sub-titles, just un-check them before you feed the torrent to your client, and only download the .avi file.  Thank you so much for this stunning  UP.   

~Hawk~

One of my favorite movies of all time. 

Sadly, the video quality of the rip doesnt it do it justice. Wish it was out on BR but I've got to go and rent it for a higher quality rip. 

Regardless, thanks Beksinski!
